metadata.title: CVE-2024-26997 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:usb: dwc2: host: Fix dereference issue in DDMA completion flow.Fixed variable dereference issue in DDMA completion flow.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
